languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their line of sight and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking attacks of opportunity, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} temporary wounds for 1 round. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects lasts while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy has a melee weapon only, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to hit that enemy's allies, if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle. Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This ability can be used multiple times per turn, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy he sees — and an empty adjacent cell. The Cyber-Eagle lands in that cell, dealing twice its weapon damage to all enemies around and making the chosen enemy {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Obstructed{/g}: if equipped with a ranged weapon, they won’t run away and must shoot through the Cyber-Eagle, provoking a counter-attack thereafter. In addition, that enemy makes an attack through the Cyber-Eagle right after it lands. If the enemy can't make an attack, the Cyber-Eagle counter-attacks either way. The Cyber-Eagle also receives {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} temporary Wounds for 1 round.
This ability has no cooldown, but with each consequent use, its cost increases by +1 AP.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.
languages.original_text:
Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} и свободную клетку рядом с этим врагом. Киберорел приземляется туда, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g} и не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, наносит удвоенный урон от оружия врагам на соседних клетках и получает {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Для указанного врага {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}заблокирован обзор{/g}, пока киберорел находится в указанной клетке. Если у этого врага есть только {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашное{/g} оружие, он совершает против киберорла атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Если у него есть дистанционное оружие, он стреляет в киберорла атакой, требующей меньше всего ОД, с увеличенным на 50% шансом попасть в своих союзников, если они есть в конусе за киберорлом. Затем киберорел атакует этого врага, нанося увеличенный на {uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% урон, без затрат ОД.
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Способность{/g} можно применять несколько раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

languages.original_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости и свободную клетку рядом с этим врагом. Киберорел приземляется туда, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g} и не провоцируя атаки по возможности, наносит удвоенный урон от оружия врагам на соседних клетках и получает {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} временного здоровья на 1 раунд. Для указанного врага {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}заблокирован обзор{/g}, пока киберорел находится в указанной клетке. Если у этого врага есть только рукопашное оружие, он совершает против киберорла атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД. Если у него есть дистанционное оружие, он стреляет в киберорла атакой, требующей меньше всего ОД, с увеличенным на 50% шансом попасть в своих союзников, если они есть в конусе за киберорлом. Затем киберорел атакует этого врага, нанося увеличенный на {uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% урон, без затрат ОД.
Способность можно применять несколько раз за ход, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

Надзиратель выбирает врага в зоне видимости и свободную клетку рядом с этим врагом. Киберорел приземляется туда, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g} и не провоцируя атаки по возможности, наносит удвоенный урон от оружия врагам на соседних клетках и получает {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} временного здоровья на 1 раунд. Для указанного врага {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}заблокирован обзор{/g}, пока киберорел находится в указанной клетке. Если у этого врага есть только рукопашное оружие, он совершает против киберорла атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД. Если у него есть дистанционное оружие, он стреляет в киберорла атакой, требующей меньше всего ОД, с увеличенным на 50% шансом попасть в своих союзников, если они есть в конусе за киберорлом. Затем киберорел атакует этого врага, нанося увеличенный на {uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% урон, без затрат ОД.
Способность можно применять несколько раз за ход, но каждое последующее применение в раунде увеличивает ее стоимость на 1 ОД до конца раунда.

languages.text:
Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler hört auf zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, landet auf diesem Feld, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren, fügt Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen doppelten Waffenschaden zu und erhält 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Der anvisierte Gegner wird {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}. Der Effekt dauert an, solange sich der Cyber-Adler auf dem entsprechenden Feld befindet. Hat dieser Gegner lediglich eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g}, attackiert er den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann mehrmals pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.
languages.original_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner Sichtlinie und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler hört auf zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, landet auf diesem Feld, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren, fügt Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen doppelten Waffenschaden zu und erhält 1 Runde lang {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} temporäre Wunden. Der anvisierte Gegner wird {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}. Der Effekt dauert an, solange sich der Cyber-Adler auf dem entsprechenden Feld befindet. Hat dieser Gegner lediglich eine Nahkampfwaffe, attackiert er den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu treffen (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.

Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der anvisierte Gegner wird {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}. Der Effekt dauert an, solange sich der Cyber-Adler auf dem entsprechenden Feld befindet. Hat dieser Gegner lediglich eine Nahkampfwaffe, attackiert er den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.

Der Aufseher wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und ein angrenzendes freies Feld aus. Der Cyber-Adler hört auf zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, landet auf diesem Feld, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren, fügt Gegnern auf angrenzenden Feldern seinen doppelten Waffenschaden zu und erhält 1 Runde lang {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Der anvisierte Gegner wird {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmt{/g}. Der Effekt dauert an, solange sich der Cyber-Adler auf dem entsprechenden Feld befindet. Hat dieser Gegner lediglich eine Nahkampfwaffe, attackiert er den Cyber-Adler mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten. Hat der Gegner eine Fernkampfwaffe, feuert er mit dem Angriff mit den geringsten AP-Kosten auf den Cyber-Adler und hat eine zusätzliche Chance von +50 %, seine Verbündeten zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} (sofern sich diese innerhalb des Kegels hinter dem Cyber-Adler aufhalten). Anschließend attackiert der Cyber-Adler diesen Gegner und fügt ihm für 0 AP +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % mehr Schaden zu.
Diese Fähigkeit kann mehrmals pro Zug eingesetzt werden, aber jeder weitere Einsatz innerhalb einer Runde kostet bis zum Ende der Runde +1 AP.

languages.text:
Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle cesse de {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}voler{/g}, atterrit sur cette case sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, inflige deux fois les dégâts de son arme aux ennemis adjacents et gagne {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}. Si cette cible n'a qu'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.
languages.original_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa ligne de mire, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle cesse de {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}voler{/g}, atterrit sur cette case sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité, inflige deux fois les dégâts de son arme aux ennemis adjacents et gagne {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} blessures temporaires pendant 1 round. Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}. Si cette cible n'a qu'une arme de mêlée, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de toucher ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.

Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle cesse de {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}voler{/g}, atterrit sur cette case sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, inflige deux fois les dégâts de son arme aux ennemis adjacents et gagne {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} pendant 1 round. Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}. Si cette cible n'a qu'une arme de mêlée, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.

Le surveillant sélectionne un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}, ainsi qu'une case inoccupée et adjacente à la cible. Le cyber-aigle cesse de {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}voler{/g}, atterrit sur cette case sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, inflige deux fois les dégâts de son arme aux ennemis adjacents et gagne {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} pendant 1 round. Tant que le cyber-aigle se trouve sur cette case, la cible est {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruée{/g}. Si cette cible n'a qu'une arme de mêlée, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} sur le cyber-aigle. Si elle a une arme à distance, elle lance son attaque coûtant le moins de PA sur le cyber-aigle, avec +50 % de chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} ses alliés situés dans un cône derrière le cyber-aigle. Le cyber-aigle attaque ensuite la cible en lui infligeant +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de dégâts, sans dépenser de PA.
Cette capacité peut être utilisée plusieurs fois par tour, mais chaque utilisation supplémentaire au cours du même round augmente son coût de +1 PA jusqu'à la fin du round.

languages.text:
监察官选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，同时选择目标敌人身边未被占据的格子。生化猎鹰退出{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，降落在目标格子处，此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。随后，对周围所有敌人造成双倍武器伤害，同时获得{uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。目标敌人陷入{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}状态，且只要生化猎鹰停留在目标格内，此状态就会始终生效。如果目标敌人仅拥有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，则会使用消耗行动点数最低的攻击方式攻击生化猎鹰。如果目标敌人拥有远程武器，则会使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式，朝生化猎鹰所在的方向进行射击，同时有50%的额外几率{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友（假如生化猎鹰所在方向的锥形范围内有盟友）。在此之后，生化猎鹰攻击目标敌人，此次攻击不消耗行动点数，且造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。
languages.original_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
监察官选择视线范围内的一名敌人，同时选择目标敌人身边未被占据的格子。生化猎鹰退出{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，降落在目标格子处，此次移动不会引发借机攻击。随后，对周围所有敌人造成双倍武器伤害，同时获得{uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571}点临时生命值，持续一轮。目标敌人陷入{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}状态，且只要生化猎鹰停留在目标格内，此状态就会始终生效。如果目标敌人仅拥有近战武器，则会使用消耗行动点数最低的攻击方式攻击生化猎鹰。如果目标敌人拥有远程武器，则会使用行动点数消耗最低的攻击方式，朝生化猎鹰所在的方向进行射击，同时有50%的额外几率命中盟友（假如生化猎鹰所在方向的锥形范围内有盟友）。在此之后，生化猎鹰攻击目标敌人，此次攻击不消耗行动点数，且造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%。
此能力每回合可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。

监察官选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内的一名敌人，同时选择目标敌人身边未被占据的格子。生化猎鹰退出{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，降落在目标格子处，此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。随后，对周围所有敌人造成双倍武器伤害，同时获得{uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，持续一轮。目标敌人陷入{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}状态，且只要生化猎鹰停留在目标格内，此状态就会始终生效。如果目标敌人仅拥有近战武器，则会使用消耗行动点数最低的攻击方式攻击生化猎鹰。如果目标敌人拥有远程武器，则会使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式，朝生化猎鹰所在的方向进行射击，同时有50%的额外几率{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友（假如生化猎鹰所在方向的锥形范围内有盟友）。在此之后，生化猎鹰攻击目标敌人，此次攻击不消耗行动点数，且造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%。
此能力每回合可多次使用，但在同一轮内，每次使用时消耗的行动点数都会提高1点。

languages.text:
El supervisor elige a un enemigo al que tenga {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y una casilla vacía adyacente a él. La ciberáguila deja su posición {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, aterriza en esa casilla sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}, inflige el doble de su daño de arma a los enemigos adyacentes y obtiene {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El enemigo designado queda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} (el efecto dura mientras la ciberáguila esté en la casilla designada). Si el enemigo designado solo tiene un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, ataca a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Si el enemigo tiene un arma a distancia, dispara a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste, teniendo una posibilidad adicional de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a sus propios aliados (suponiendo que haya alguno en un cono tras la ciberáguila). Después, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo infligiendo un +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de daño y gastando 0 PA.
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se puede usar varias veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 PA hasta el final del asalto.
languages.original_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
El supervisor elige a un enemigo al que tenga línea de visión y una casilla vacía adyacente a él. La ciberáguila deja su posición {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, aterriza en esa casilla sin provocar ataques de oportunidad, inflige el doble de su daño de arma a los enemigos adyacentes y obtiene {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} heridas temporales durante 1 asalto. El enemigo designado queda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} (el efecto dura mientras la ciberáguila esté en la casilla designada). Si el enemigo designado solo tiene un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, ataca a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste. Si el enemigo tiene un arma a distancia, dispara a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste, teniendo una posibilidad adicional de +50 % de impactar a sus propios aliados (suponiendo que haya alguno en un cono tras la ciberáguila). Después, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo infligiendo un +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de daño y gastando 0 PA.
Esta capacidad se puede usar varias veces por turno, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 PA hasta el final del asalto.

El supervisor elige a un enemigo al que tenga {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y una casilla vacía adyacente a él. La ciberáguila deja su posición {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, aterriza en esa casilla sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}, inflige el doble de su daño de arma a los enemigos adyacentes y obtiene {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} durante 1 asalto. El enemigo designado queda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} (el efecto dura mientras la ciberáguila esté en la casilla designada). Si el enemigo designado solo tiene un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, ataca a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste. Si el enemigo tiene un arma a distancia, dispara a la ciberáguila con el ataque que menos PA cueste, teniendo una posibilidad adicional de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a sus propios aliados (suponiendo que haya alguno en un cono tras la ciberáguila). Después, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo infligiendo un +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} % de daño y gastando 0 PA.
Esta capacidad se puede usar varias veces por turno, pero cada uso durante un mismo asalto incrementa el coste en +1 PA hasta el final del asalto.

languages.text:
監督官は{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中にいる敵とその隣の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を止め、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなくそのセルに着陸し、隣接する敵にその武器ダメージの2倍を与え、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が付与される。指定された敵は{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}状態になる（この効果はサイバーイーグルが指定されたセルにいる間継続する）。敵が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器しか持っていない場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する。敵が遠隔武器を持っている場合、味方に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}当たる{/g}確率が+50%追加された状態で、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する（サイバーイーグルの後ろの扇状範囲内に敵の味方がいる場合）。その後、サイバーイーグルは敵を攻撃し、0APで+{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%の追加ダメージを与える。
この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に複数回使用できるが、ターン終了時まで1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。
languages.original_text:
The Overseer chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and an unoccupied cell adjacent to it. The cyber-eagle stops {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, lands at that cell without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, deals twice its weapon damage to adjacent enemies, and gains {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The designated enemy becomes {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} (the effects last while the cyber-eagle is in the designated cell). If this enemy only has a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, it attacks the cyber-eagle, using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack. If that enemy has a ranged weapon, it shoots at the cyber-eagle, using the lowest AP-cost attack, with an additional +50% chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies (if there are any within a cone behind the cyber-eagle). Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can be used multiple times per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but each subsequent use within a round increases its cost by +1 AP until the end of round.

traits.locale_text:
監督官は視線の中にいる敵とその隣の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を止め、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなくそのセルに着陸し、隣接する敵にその武器ダメージの2倍を与え、1ラウンドの間{uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571}一時的な傷が付与される。指定された敵は{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}状態になる（この効果はサイバーイーグルが指定されたセルにいる間継続する）。敵が近接武器しか持っていない場合、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する。敵が遠隔武器を持っている場合、味方に当たる確率が+50%追加された状態で、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する（サイバーイーグルの後ろの扇状範囲内に敵の味方がいる場合）。その後、サイバーイーグルは敵を攻撃し、0APで+{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%の追加ダメージを与える。
このアビリティは1ターンに複数回使用できるが、ターン終了時まで1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。

監督官は視線の中にいる敵とその隣の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を止め、機会攻撃を引き起こすことなくそのセルに着陸し、隣接する敵にその武器ダメージの2倍を与え、1ラウンドの間{uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571}一時的な傷が付与される。指定された敵は{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}状態になる（この効果はサイバーイーグルが指定されたセルにいる間継続する）。敵が近接武器しか持っていない場合、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する。敵が遠隔武器を持っている場合、味方に当たる確率が+50%追加された状態で、AP消費量が一番少ない攻撃でサイバーイーグルを攻撃する（サイバーイーグルの後ろの扇状範囲内に敵の味方がいる場合）。その後、サイバーイーグルは敵を攻撃し、0APで+{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}%の追加ダメージを与える。
このアビリティは1ターンに複数回使用できるが、ターン終了時まで1ラウンド内で使用するたびにコストが+1AP増える。

languages.text:
Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir düşmanı ve o düşmanın bitişiğindeki boş bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeyi{/g} bırakarak herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetiklemeden o hücreye iner. Bitişikteki düşmanlara silah hasarının iki katını verir ve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Seçilen düşman, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenir{/g} (etki, siber kartal seçilen hücrede bulunduğu sürece devam eder). Bu düşman, yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahına sahipse en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala saldırır. Aynı düşman, menzilli silaha sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala ateş eder. Bu saldırının o düşmanın dost birimlerini {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurma{/g} olasılığı +%50 daha fazla olur (siber kartalın arkasındaki konilik bir alan içinde bir dost birimi varsa). Ardından siber kartal, bu düşmana saldırarak +%{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} daha fazla hasar verir ve 0 EP harcar.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli o raunt sona erene dek bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.

Then, the cyber-eagle attacks this enemy, dealing +{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba}% more damage and spending 0 AP.

traits.locale_text:
Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattındaki{/g} bir düşmanı ve o düşmanın bitişiğindeki boş bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeyi{/g} bırakarak herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetiklemeden o hücreye iner. Bitişikteki düşmanlara silah hasarının iki katını verir ve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Seçilen düşman, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenir{/g} (etki, siber kartal seçilen hücrede bulunduğu sürece devam eder). Bu düşman, yalnızca {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahına sahipse en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala saldırır. Aynı düşman, menzilli silaha sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala ateş eder. Bu saldırının o düşmanın dost birimlerini {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurma{/g} olasılığı +%50 daha fazla olur (siber kartalın arkasındaki konilik bir alan içinde bir dost birimi varsa). Ardından siber kartal, bu düşmana saldırarak +%{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} daha fazla hasar verir ve 0 EP harcar.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli o raunt sona erene dek bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.

Gözetmen, görüş hattındaki bir düşmanı ve o düşmanın bitişiğindeki boş bir hücreyi seçer. Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeyi{/g} bırakarak herhangi bir fırsat saldırısını tetiklemeden o hücreye iner. Bitişikteki düşmanlara silah hasarının iki katını verir ve 1 rauntluğuna {uip|PERBonusDamage|e985b758fa94464abfd506c773409571} geçici sağlık puanı kazanır. Seçilen düşman, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenir{/g} (etki, siber kartal seçilen hücrede bulunduğu sürece devam eder). Bu düşman, yalnızca yakın dövüş silahına sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala saldırır. Aynı düşman, menzilli silaha sahipse en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla siber kartala ateş eder. Bu saldırının o düşmanın dost birimlerini vurma olasılığı +%50 daha fazla olur (siber kartalın arkasındaki konilik bir alan içinde bir dost birimi varsa). Ardından siber kartal, bu düşmana saldırarak +%{uip|Damage|53135057d69647a7854e578c5ef40bba} daha fazla hasar verir ve 0 EP harcar.
Bu kabiliyet, bir tur içinde birden çok kez kullanılabilir ancak bir raunt içinde her kullanıldığında bedeli o raunt sona erene dek bir öncekine göre +1 EP artar.
